resources.string: You are about to go to a platform external to the application. NapoleoN Chat does not save or have access to the data provided on this platform. Are you sure you want to go to this site?
You must select a subscription type

Next, you will be redirected to a payment portal, this portal is external to NapoleoN Chat, therefore, it does not have the same characteristics as our application and you must accept the terms and conditions stipulated for its use. We are not responsible for the treatment of the data provided in the payment module.
If you cancel this subscription, you can only use chat to NN DD-MM-AA (ending date place subscription)
Remember that you can subscribe to another package that suits your needs at any time.
An error canceling your subscription, please try later occurred.
You already have this plan currently active.
An error ocurred. Please try again later.
Your subscription expired, you will only receive messages.
Enjoy real privacy, manage your account.
